document_data.mainbody:
lcrimmon Alskayl was a hunter of the village of Maskyrs Eye in the Vast in the 14 century DR.
His father, Skuulaghh Alskayl, was infamous for his hedonism and had lots of children born in wedlock and lots of bastards born out of it, leaving Ulcrimmon with many siblings and step-siblings. They formed a clan of hunters in Maskyrs Eye by around 1357 DR.
He was coarse of manners and shady of character.
